amendment.description: Amendment limits the ability of Federal judges to order the release of convicted felons based on a civil action pertaining to prison conditions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in the Congressional Record of April 22, 1998 to prohibit the release or non-admission of prisoners from prison solely on the basis of the condition of the prison facility.

action.text: On agreeing to the DeLay amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 367 - 52 (Roll No. 105).
